name: SABOTAJE | MUÑECO VUDU
description:
LYRICS: MANYA (@Joaquin37381415)
PROD. MIX & MASTER: DIBAXU (@dibaxuP)

* By purchasing this NFT you are contributing to the realization of the next album. If you get 4 songs from SABOTAJE you will receive a free track from the next album, and if you get 6 you will receive 2 tracks.

LYRICS
Mírame pasar sobre la ciudad
Drogadicta esta sociedad
Pedimos tan simplemente solo un poco más y mas 
Y masificamos esta forma de pensar

Me encuentro extraño, pero eso no es raro 
es la locomotora que hoy sigue andando
Datando la fecha de chapar al daño 
para otras lenguas andar saboreando 
y poder encontrarse en lo explorado

Esa ansiedad que da poco relajo son
Cucharas con fuego debajo
Un vicio que me hace como el carajo
Dejando en mi muñeco vudú como veinte tajos

Y es sabido que en el olvido dejamos lo dicho, 
pero dentro mío me deja aturdido el frio 
que respiro y no inspiro en la materialización de dejarlo vivo

Okey no puedo más esa es la verdad
 todo me hace tan mal y no lo puedo ni parar
 la sonrisa es artificial like payaso de mac
 pero por la vulnerabilidad 
telaraña venenosa que enreda mi libertad
en cuantos capullos la mariposa se tiene que enredar 
y para una flor cuantas semillas serían las que hoy se irán a enterrar

entre mentiras e iras que poco inspiran se pira mi cordura tan
delirada que adaptada a la gira se tira al mar 
y no sabe nadar se está por ahogar
no hay bañero que salve esta inutilidad

mírame pasar sobre la ciudad 
drogadicta esta sociedad
poderla cambiar parece ficticio nomas 
como la sonrisa de mierda de ese payaso del mal

esa ansiedad que da poco relajo son
cucharas con fuego debajo 
un vicio que me hace como el carajo
dejando en mi muñeco vudú como veinte tajos

welcome to the crazy life that is unviable
I believe in living simply but isn’t easy thinking 
if it is insignificant to give this dirty rithym to you my crazy lil kid

pensando demasiado siento malestar, pensando demasiado, pensando demasiado
pensando demasiado me quiero matar, pensando demasiado, pensando demasiado
pensando demasiado no puedo estar, pensando demasiado, pensando demasiado

ENGLISH:
Watch me pass over the city
Drug addicted this society
We ask for just a little bit more and more 
And we massify this way of thinking

I find myself strange, but that's not strange 
It's the locomotive that today keeps on running
Dating the date of the damage 
for other languages to go tasting 
and to be able to find oneself in the explored

That anxiety that gives little relaxation are
spoons with fire underneath
A vice that makes me like shit
Leaving in my voodoo doll as twenty slashes

And it is known that in oblivion we leave what has been said, 
But inside me the cold leaves me stunned 
That I breathe and I don't inspire in the materialization of leaving it alive

Okey I can't take it anymore that's the truth
 everything makes me so bad and I can't even stop it
 the smile is artificial like clown of mac
 but for the vulnerability 
poisonous web that entangles my freedom
how many cocoons the butterfly has to entangle itself in 
and for a flower how many seeds would be the ones that will go to bury today

between lies and anger that inspire little, my sanity so delirious that
delirious that adapted to the tour it throws itself into the sea 
and doesn't know how to swim it's about to drown
there's no swimmer to save this uselessness

watch me pass over the city 
drug addict this society
to be able to change it seems fictitious only 
like the shitty smile of that evil clown

that anxiety that gives little relaxation are
spoons with fire underneath 
a vice that makes me like shit
leaving in my voodoo doll like twenty slashes

welcome to the crazy life that is unviable
I believe in living simply but isn't easy thinking 
if it is insignificant to give this dirty rithym to you my crazy lil kid

thinking too much I feel uneasy, thinking too much, thinking too much
thinking too much I want to kill myself, thinking too much, thinking too much
thinking too much I can't be, thinking too much, thinking too much, thinking too much
